name: strawberry-jam
description: strawberry jam is my personal fork of the project jam created and developed by sxip.
author: glvckoma

scripts.dev: npm run pack && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.test: npm run pack && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron .
scripts.pack: cd assets/extracted-winapp-public && npx electron-rebuild -f -w keytar -v 32.0.1 && cd ../.. && npx asar pack assets/extracted-winapp-public assets/winapp.asar --unpack *.node
scripts.build: npm run pack && npx electron-builder build -w
scripts.publish: npm run pack && npm run build && npx electron-builder build -w -p always
